data.actual_result: There's the message about needing to wait 10 minutes there System Settings: Android 4.1.2, Samsung Galaxy S2
data.short_description: When switching from a server with the 10-minute verification level to the friends list while not being able to speak in the server yet, the message about needing to wait 10 minutes stays.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter a server with 10 minute verification level - Go to your friends list - Go to the server again - Go to the friends list again
